Potion.name: Potion
Potion.description: A basic curative item that restores a small amount of HP to a single party member.

Ether.name: Ether
Ether.description: A magical elixir that replenishes a small amount of MP to a single party member.

Antidote.name: Antidote
Antidote.description: An item that cures poison status ailments, protecting the user from toxins.

Phoenix Down.name: Phoenix Down
Phoenix Down.description: A rare item that revives a fallen party member with a small amount of HP.

Elixir.name: Elixir
Elixir.description: A powerful concoction that fully restores both HP and MP for a single party member.

Mega Potion.name: Mega Potion
Mega Potion.description: An upgraded version of the potion that restores a moderate amount of HP to all party members.

Turbo Ether.name: Turbo Ether
Turbo Ether.description: An upgraded version of the ether that replenishes a moderate amount of MP to all party members.

Remedy.name: Remedy
Remedy.description: A versatile item that cures various status ailments such as poison, paralysis, and silence.

Mega Phoenix.name: Mega Phoenix
Mega Phoenix.description: An upgraded version of the phoenix down that revives all fallen party members with full HP.

Megaelixir.name: Megaelixir
Megaelixir.description: The ultimate curative item that fully restores both HP and MP for the entire party.

Inferno Oil.name: Inferno Oil
Inferno Oil.description: A highly flammable oil that ignites upon contact, dealing moderate fire damage to a single enemy.

Toxic Solution.name: Toxic Solution
Toxic Solution.description: A potent concoction that inflicts poison status on a single enemy, causing gradual damage over time.

Thunder Bomb.name: Thunder Bomb
Thunder Bomb.description: An explosive device that releases a powerful lightning blast, dealing heavy damage to a single enemy.

Sleeping Gas Vial.name: Sleeping Gas Vial
Sleeping Gas Vial.description: A vial containing a potent sleeping gas that puts all enemies to sleep, rendering them immobile for a short duration.

Acidic Compound.name: Acidic Compound
Acidic Compound.description: A corrosive substance that inflicts continuous damage to a single enemy over time, eating away at their defenses.
